title: spec: docs for iota could give an example of incrementing over non-iota definitions
body:
i.e. demonstrate the latter half of "It is reset to 0 whenever the reserved word const appears in the source and increments after each ConstSpec." with something like
```
const (
	s = "a" // increments iota
	c0 = iota // c0 == 1
	t = 5
	c1 = iota // c1 == 3
)
```
as this behaviour wasn't obvious to me (as a lazy reader who prefers looking at examples).
